properties.name: lib_get_bl_package_and_rename
properties.value:
function get_bl_package_and_rename(){
   basename=`basename $0`
   timestamp="`date '+%Y%m%d%H%M%S'`_$$_${basename}"
   crtfile="${dmcli_tmpdir}/log_${timestamp}"
   mkdir -p "${dmcli_tmpdir}" 2>/dev/null
   
   lsource_dir=$1
   ldest_dir=$2
   ldest_packageName=$3
   
   
   dim_logger "I" "get last modify backup package from ${lsource_dir}"
   #Rq: 
   # on fait plutot ls -ltr "${app_depot_agent_sas}/PKG_${app_baselineId}/${app_projet}/${app_folder}" plutot que ls -ltr "${app_depot_agent_sas}/PKG_${app_baselineId}/${app_projet}/${app_folder}/*.zip" 
   # pour garantir que la commande n'echoue pas s'il y a bcp de fichier zip presents
   # => ls ls -ltr ne porte donc que sur le rep de stockage, et on filtre ensuite sur le type de fichier et sur l'extension zip
   
   # remarque 2: cas non gere si le fichier zip contient des espaces ' ' 
   dim_logger "D" "ls -ltr \"${lsource_dir}\" 2>/dev/null | egrep -v \"^d\" | egrep \"*.zip\" | awk '{print \$NF}' | tail -1"
   lastModifyFile=`ls -ltr "${lsource_dir}" 2>/dev/null | egrep -v "^d" | egrep "*.zip" | awk '{print $NF}' | tail -1`
   if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then dim_logger "E" "Impossible de lister les fichiers ${lsource_dir}/*.zip "; return 1;fi
   
   if [[ "$lastModifyFile" == "" ]]; then echo dim_logger "E" "Aucun fichier .zip n'est present dans ${lsource_dir}/ "; return 1;fi
   
   dim_logger "D" "lastModifyFile=$lastModifyFile"
   
   # add full path
   lastModifyFile="${lsource_dir}/${lastModifyFile}"
   dim_logger "D" "Full path lastModifyFile=$lastModifyFile"
   if [ ! -f "${lastModifyFile}" ]; then dim_logger "E" "Impossible de recuperer le dernier fichier zip dans ${lsource_dir}/ ";return 1;fi
   
   dim_logger "D" "lastModifyFile full path=$lastModifyFile"
   dim_logger "D" "cp \"$lastModifyFile\" \"${ldest_dir}/${ldest_packageName}\""
   cp "$lastModifyFile" "${ldest_dir}/${ldest_packageName}"
   
   if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then 
      dim_logger "E" "Impossible de copier $lastModifyFile ${ldest_dir}/${ldest_packageName}"; return 1;
   else
      dim_logger "I" "Mise a disposition de  \"${ldest_dir}/${ldest_packageName}\"" 
   fi
   return 0
}

properties.name: lib_get_package_with_bl
properties.value:
function get_package_with_bl(){
basename=`basename $0`
timestamp="`date '+%Y%m%d%H%M%S'`_$$_${basename}"
crtfile="${dmcli_tmpdir}/log_${timestamp}"
mkdir -p "${dmcli_tmpdir}" 2>/dev/null


var_pkgname=$1
var_blname=$2




dim_logger "I" "generate a random number between 0-999"
random=`expr $RANDOM % 999`
dim_logger "D" "random=$random"

dim_logger "I" "Get numBL"
dim_logger "D" "cd ${dmcli_basedir};. ./${dmcli_profile};${dmcli_exe} -user <user> -pass <password> -dbname <dbname> -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd 'LSBL' | grep \"${var_pkgname}\" | wc -l"


numBL=`cd ${dmcli_basedir};. ./${dmcli_profile};${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd 'LSBL' | grep "${var_blname}" | wc -l`
dim_logger "D" "numBL=$numBL"
if [[ "$numBL" == "" ]]; then dim_logger "E" "Get numBL KO "; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;fi



dim_logger "I" "extract package with BL"
dim_logger "D" "cd ${dmcli_basedir};. ./${dmcli_profile};${dmcli_exe} -user <user> -pass <password> -dbname <dbname> -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd \"REL \\\"ARM:RL_${var_pkgname}_${random}\\\" /BASELINE=\\"ARM:${var_pkgname}_${numBL}\\" /DIRECTORY=\\\"${app_depot_agent_node}::${app_depot_agent_sas}/${var_pkgname}\\\" /NOMETADATA\""


cd ${dmcli_basedir};. ./${dmcli_profile};${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd "REL \"ARM:RL_${var_pkgname}_${random}\" /BASELINE=\"ARM:${var_pkgname}_${numBL}\" /DIRECTORY=\"${app_depot_agent_node}::${app_depot_agent_sas}/${var_pkgname}\" /NOMETADATA" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1


if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then 
dim_logger "E" "extract package with BL KO ";rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;
else
dim_logger "I" "extract package with BL OK "; 
fi
rm -f "${crtfile}";
return 0
}

properties.name: lib_import_package_with_bl
properties.value:
function import_package_with_bl(){
basename=`basename $0`
timestamp="`date '+%Y%m%d%H%M%S'`_$$_${basename}"
crtfile="${dmcli_tmpdir}/log_${timestamp}"
mkdir -p "${dmcli_tmpdir}" 2>/dev/null



lpath_directory=$1
dim_logger "D" "lpath_directory=$lpath_directory"
lchange_doc_ids=$2
dim_logger "D" "lchange_doc_ids=$lchange_doc_ids"
var_folder=$3
dim_logger "D" "var_folder=$var_folder"
var_rlname=$4
dim_logger "D" "var_rlname=$var_rlname" 
# rlname : ${p:SBM_BckPackage} (import_bck) OR RL_${p:SBM_BaselineId} (import_pkg)
var_pkgname=$5
dim_logger "D" "var_pkgname=$var_pkgname" 
# ${p:SBM_BckPackage} (import_bck) OR PKG_${p:SBM_BaselineId} (import_pkg)
var_blname=$6
dim_logger "D" "var_blname=$var_blname" 
# ${p:SBM_BckPackage} (import_bck) OR {p:SBM_BaselineId} (import_pkg)



cd ${dmcli_basedir} 
. ./${dmcli_profile}

dim_logger "I" "check folder:${lpath_directory}\\${var_folder}"
dim_logger "D" "${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd \"REXEC /NETWORK_NODE=${app_depot_agent_node} /TEMPLATE=checkfolder.template /nobatch /user=${app_user} /password=${app_pass} /parameters=(PROJET=${lpath_directory}/${var_folder})\" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1"
${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd "REXEC /NETWORK_NODE=${app_depot_agent_node} /TEMPLATE=checkfolder.template /nobatch /user=${app_user} /password=${app_pass} /parameters=(PROJET=${lpath_directory}/${var_folder})" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1
grep "SUCCEEDED" ${crtfile}
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then dim_logger "E" "check folder KO "; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;fi

dim_logger "I" "check package"
dim_logger "D" "${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd \"REXEC /NETWORK_NODE=${app_depot_agent_node} /TEMPLATE=checkpkg.template /nobatch /user=${app_user} /password=${app_pass} /parameters=(PROJET=${lpath_directory}/${var_folder})\" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1"
${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd "REXEC /NETWORK_NODE=${app_depot_agent_node} /TEMPLATE=checkpkg.template /nobatch /user=${app_user} /password=${app_pass} /parameters=(PROJET=${lpath_directory}/${var_folder})" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1
grep "SUCCEEDED" ${crtfile}
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then dim_logger "E" "check package KO "; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;fi

dim_logger "I" "create request"
dim_logger "D" "${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd \"CC ARM LIVRAISON /AFFECTED=(\"ARM:${var_folder}\") /ATTRIBUTES=(Title=\"${var_rlname}\") /WORKSET=\"ARM:MAIN\"\" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1"
${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd "CC ARM LIVRAISON /AFFECTED=(\"ARM:${var_folder}\") /ATTRIBUTES=(Title=\"${var_rlname}\") /WORKSET=\"ARM:MAIN\"" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then dim_logger "E" "create request KO "; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;fi

dim_logger "I" "get number livraison"
numLiv=`cat ${crtfile} | grep ARM_LIVRAISON | sed 's/[^[:digit:]]//g'`
if [[ "$numLiv" == "" ]]; then dim_logger "E" "get number livraison KO "; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;fi
dim_logger "D" "numLiv=$numLiv"




dim_logger "I" "import File"
dim_logger "D" "${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd \"UPLOAD /DIRECTORY=\"${lpath_directory}\\${var_folder}\" /WORKSET=\"ARM:MAIN\" /NOKEEP /FORCE_CHECKIN /RECURSIVE /CHANGE_DOC_IDS=(${lchange_doc_ids}_${numLiv}) /PART=\"ARM:${var_folder}\"\" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1"
${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd "UPLOAD /DIRECTORY=\"${lpath_directory}\\${var_folder}\" /WORKSET=\"ARM:MAIN\" /NOKEEP /FORCE_CHECKIN /RECURSIVE /CHANGE_DOC_IDS=(${lchange_doc_ids}_${numLiv}) /PART=\"ARM:${var_folder}\"" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then dim_logger "E" "import File KO "; echo "rm -f \"${crtfile}\""; return 1;fi

dim_logger "I" "close request"
dim_logger "D" "${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd \"AC ${lchange_doc_ids}_${numLiv} /STATUS=\"FERME\"\""
${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd "AC ${lchange_doc_ids}_${numLiv} /STATUS=\"FERME\""
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then dim_logger "E" "close request KO "; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;fi

dim_logger "I" "Get numBL"
dim_logger "D" "cd ${dmcli_basedir};. ./${dmcli_profile};${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd 'LSBL' | grep \"${var_blname}\" | wc -l"
numBL=`cd ${dmcli_basedir};. ./${dmcli_profile};${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd 'LSBL' | grep "${var_blname}" | wc -l`
dim_logger "D" "numBL=$numBL"
if [[ "$numBL" == "" ]]; then dim_logger "E" "Get numBL KO "; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;fi

dim_logger "I" "increment numBL_long"
numBL_long=`echo "${numBL} + 1" | bc`
dim_logger "D" "numBL_long=$numBL_long"
if [[ "$numBL_long" == "" ]]; then echo "Erreur durant le calcul de l'increment"; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;fi

dim_logger "I" "create baseline"
dim_logger "D" "${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd \"CBL \"ARM:${var_pkgname}_${numBL_long}\" /PART=\"ARM:${var_folder}\" /TEMPLATE_ID=\"ALL_LIVRAISON\" /WORKSET=\"ARM:MAIN\" /LEVEL=\"0\"/TYPE=\"BASELINE\"/CHANGE_DOC_IDS=(${lchange_doc_ids}_${numLiv}) /INCLUDE_CLOSED /SCOPE=\"PART\"\" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1"
${dmcli_exe} -user ${dmcli_user} -pass ${dmcli_pass} -dbname ${dmcli_dbname} -dsn ${dmcli_dsn} -cmd "CBL \"ARM:${var_pkgname}_${numBL_long}\" /PART=\"ARM:${var_folder}\" /TEMPLATE_ID=\"ALL_LIVRAISON\" /WORKSET=\"ARM:MAIN\" /LEVEL=\"0\"/TYPE=\"BASELINE\"/CHANGE_DOC_IDS=(${lchange_doc_ids}_${numLiv}) /INCLUDE_CLOSED /SCOPE=\"PART\"" 1> ${crtfile} 2>&1
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then 
dim_logger "E" "create baseline KO "; rm -f "${crtfile}"; return 1;
else
dim_logger "I" "create baseline OK ";
fi
rm -f "${crtfile}";

return 0
}

properties.scriptBody:
# init variable
Var_source_dir="${p:Var_source_dir}"
Var_dest_dir="${p:Var_dest_dir}"
Var_dest_packageName="${p:Var_dest_packageName}"

# Cst Env Variable
dmcli_basedir="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_basedir}"
dmcli_tmpdir="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_tmpdir}"
dmcli_profile="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_profile}"
dmcli_exe="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_exe}"
dmcli_user="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_user}"
dmcli_pass="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_pass}"
dmcli_dbname="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_dbname}"
dmcli_dsn="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_dsn}"
app_user="${p:environment/Cst_Dim_app_user}"
app_pass="${p:environment/Cst_Dim_app_pass}"
app_depot_agent_node="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_SSHHost}"
app_depot_agent_sas="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_SASDepot}"

# load function
${p:component/lib_dim_logger}
${p:component/lib_import_package_with_bl}
${p:component/lib_get_bl_package_and_rename}
${p:component/lib_get_package_with_bl}

echo "Show Environment"
set | egrep  "^dmcli_"
set | egrep "^app_"
echo ""
echo "cmd:get_bl_package_and_rename \"${Var_source_dir}\" \"${Var_dest_dir}\" \"${Var_dest_packageName}\""
get_bl_package_and_rename "${Var_source_dir}" "${Var_dest_dir}" "${Var_dest_packageName}"
exit $?

# init variable
var_pkgname="${p:var_pkgname}"
var_blname="${p:var_blname}"
   
# Cst Env Variable
dmcli_basedir="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_basedir}"
dmcli_tmpdir="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_tmpdir}"
dmcli_profile="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_profile}"
dmcli_exe="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_exe}"
dmcli_user="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_user}"
dmcli_pass="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_pass}"
dmcli_dbname="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_dbname}"
dmcli_dsn="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_dsn}"
app_user="${p:environment/Cst_Dim_app_user}"
app_pass="${p:environment/Cst_Dim_app_pass}"
app_depot_agent_node="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_SSHHost}"
app_depot_agent_sas="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_SASDepot}"

# load function
${p:component/lib_dim_logger}
${p:component/lib_import_package_with_bl}
${p:component/lib_get_bl_package_and_rename}
${p:component/lib_get_package_with_bl}

echo "Show Environment"
set | egrep  "^dmcli_"
set | egrep "^app_"
echo ""
echo "cmd:get_package_with_bl \"${var_pkgname}\" \"${var_blname}\""
get_package_with_bl "${var_pkgname} ${var_blname}" 
exit $?

# init variable


# Cst Env Variable
dmcli_basedir="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_basedir}"
dmcli_tmpdir="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_tmpdir}"
dmcli_profile="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_profile}"
dmcli_exe="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_exe}"
dmcli_user="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_user}"
dmcli_pass="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_pass}"
dmcli_dbname="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_dbname}"
dmcli_dsn="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_dmcli_dsn}"
app_user="${p:environment/Cst_Dim_app_user}"
app_pass="${p:environment/Cst_Dim_app_pass}"
app_depot_agent_node="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_SSHHost}"
app_depot_agent_sas="${p:environment/Cst_DIM_SASDepot}"

# load function
${p:component/lib_dim_logger}
${p:component/lib_import_package_with_bl}
${p:component/lib_get_bl_package_and_rename}
${p:component/lib_get_package_with_bl}

echo "Show Environment"
#set | egrep  "^dmcli_"
#set | egrep "^app_"






echo "cmd:import_package_with_bl \"${p:Var_directory}\" \"${p:Var_change_doc_ids}\" \"${p:SBM_Folder}\" \"${p:var_rlname}\" \"${p:var_pkgname}\" \"${p:var_blname}\" "
import_package_with_bl "${p:Var_directory}" "${p:Var_change_doc_ids}" "${p:SBM_Folder}" "${p:var_rlname}" "${p:var_pkgname}"  "${p:var_blname}"
exit $?

properties.name: lib_logger

edges.from: Transfert Bck Package to Unix Dest

edges.to: Transfert Bck Package to Unix Dest

offsets.name: Transfert Bck Package to Unix Dest

children.name: Transfert Bck Package to Unix Dest

properties.cmdline:
LogFileName="${p:EAI_TempBaseDir}/${p:SBM_Nom_Log}"
echo "LogFileName:${LogFileName}"

#EAI_WEBMETHOD_LOG=$(cat ${LogFileName} | awk '/Deploy Deployment Candidate\]/,/.xml/' | grep -v 'Deploy Deployment Candidate' | grep -v 'INFO' | sed -e 's/^.*://g' -e 's/ //g' | awk '{print $0}')
#if [[ -z $EAI_WEBMETHOD_LOG ]] ; then  
#	EAI_WEBMETHOD_LOG=$(cat ${LogFileName} | awk '/Simulate Deployment Candidate\]/,/.xml/' | grep -v 'Simulate Deployment Candidate' | grep -v 'INFO' | sed -e 's/^.*://g' -e 's/ //g' | awk '{print $0}')
#fi

EAI_WEBMETHOD_LOG=$(grep -i '.*report.*.xml' ${LogFileName} | tr -d ' ' )
echo "EAI_WEBMETHOD_LOG=$EAI_WEBMETHOD_LOG"

properties.scriptBody:
def myRegEx = /(.*)-$/
def String tmpSBM_Projet="${p:SBM_Projet}"
matcher = ( tmpSBM_Projet =~ myRegEx )
if (matcher.matches()) {
	tmpSBM_Projet=matcher[0][1]
}
outProps.setProperty("Nom_Projet","${tmpSBM_Projet}")
